property.value: DMBD-22 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Zero Birth

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Beat Jockey/Wonderforce

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, gacharange summon. That gacharange creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ({GACHARANGE SUMMON}: Summon the top card of your super gacharange with its cost paid.) (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-22 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Zero Birth

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Mana Drive 3 (Water): If you have 3 or more cards in your mana zone and one or more of them is water civilization, this creature gets "blocker". (You may tap a creature that has "blocker" to change the attack target of an opponent's creature to that creature.) (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-22 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Zero Birth

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Mafi Gang/Deletron

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, choose up to 3 cards in your opponent's graveyard. Your opponent puts them on the bottom of their deck in any order. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.value: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your water or darkness cards in your graveyard. It can't cost 0 or less. ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, your opponent chooses 2 cards from their hand and discards them. {TRIPLE BREAKER} TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your creatures. Then choose one of your opponent's creatures and destroy it.
